text:
OpenTable | SF Onsite | Lead Full-stack Engineer

We're hiring for lots of roles, but we're particularly looking for a lead front-end engineer to be a founding member of our ad and analytics engineering team in a $10+Bn GMV marketplace. It is a small, but rapidly growing, team; we're both building new products from the ground up and extending OpenTable's existing marketplace.

http://app.jobvite.com/m?3PCpUhww
